column4: Is it possible to upgrade Ubuntu 10.04 to Ubuntu 10.10 while running 10.10?
you want to go from 10.10 to 10.04 if I understand correctly?
i am confused.  you said you wanted to upgrade 10.04 to 10.10 while 10.10 is running.
okay not what you posted.  yes it is possible, but i have experienced problems (personally) with upgrading, so I do a fresh install.
